title: Pure Love(Instrumental)
lyrics:
Yeah, ha, ha, HBK
Yeah, you know how we play

And it's a feeling you reminding me of

An energy that come from high up above

And no other could describe our love

I can't run away and go hide somewhere



Get a ring on your finger, share my last name

'Cause you know I'm so in love with you, you know I'm so in love with you

We, we go-got, connection

I need your love and affection

'Cause you know I'm so in love with you

Know, know I'm so in love with you, yeah



I wish that love was mine, wish that love was mine, one day

I wish that love was mine, wish that love was mine, one day
